meta.description: An application for monitoring, profiling and inspecting a running eXist-db instance.
meta.author: Wolfgang Meier
Joe Wicentowski
Lars Windauer

ul.li: New function console:dump prints all variables in the local variable stack, which are visible at the point the statement appears in the code.
Info popup in remote console causes browser display issues.
Send alerts only to receivers watching the affected instance
Store last ping status in db; send alerts only if status changed
